website_summaries.verdict: A mid-sized flower vase with a style that is both minimalist and colorful. Customers who prefer a sturdy build will appreciate its heft.
pros: The combination of this vase's striped and speckled graphics give it an interesting look that is fresh and modern
9.45-inch height isn't too big or too small
cons: It's on the heavy side, but this is a bonus if durability is your top priority

customer_reviews.title: Hard to see design
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t planted anything in this so far, but I would just note that the thing I noticed about this planter when I first put it into its final location was that the stripes aren’t very high on the planter as you can see in the photo, with the result being that the stripes are difficult to see except from a distance. Fortunately, since there’s no drainage hole, you don’t need a saucer and you could potentially get a stand to raise it up if it really bothered you. Colors are as pictured. Material is of lighter weight than I expected, but it is still pretty heavy. Amazon, I wish you hadn’t sent this to me inside a separate box...
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy beautiful pot, but no drainage hole
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pot, sturdy, slightly lighter than expected, but that's better for moving around. The yellow and green stripes are slightly mis-aligned as depicted in other reviews. Also grey bottom portion seems like it may easily scratch, so I'll definitely be careful with it. I wish it had a drainage hole. Other than that, it's a beautiful pot and displays my plant wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Nickadilly

customer_reviews.title: Not the color that I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The color of the product is written as teal in the picture represents it as teal but the actual product is a lime green just not what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Plant + Pot happiness
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m very happy with my purchase and the pot looks fantastic. The pot feels high quality and my plant looks great in it. I’ve received many compliments! The one drawback is that there appears to be a misaligned color marking around the colored edges, and this gives off a chipped look. It’s not a problem for me because I turned that side of the pot to face the wall but it’s something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: Thick, heavy, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This pot is heavy and sturdy feeling. It is exactly as pictured as far as coloring. It is much bigger than I expected but that I my own fault for not paying closer attention, and in the end it turned out more perfect than expected for on of the plants that needed to be re-potted.
customer_reviews.author: swifty

customer_reviews.title: Missing hole
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these and it was perfect for what I needed it for. Then, I noticed another plant busting out of its pot so I ordered a second one of these. This one still looks great, it’s heavy, pretty- but it doesn’t have a drainage hole in the bottom. The first one I ordered had a hole AND little plugs for it. I was disappointed because I ordered two of the same thing and got different things. Sorry- I need the hole!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little planter
customer_reviews.text: This planter is sturdy and a good size for those plants that have outgrown their 4” nursery pot. I use it as a cachepot for a peperomia. I do wish it came in more/different colors — these are OK and the listing photos are true to life, but those aren’t my living room colors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carnevale

customer_reviews.title: No drainage
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews before purchasing, about half complaining that there was no drainage and the other half saying that there was an unexpected drainage hole. I bought this to repot a plant in and it is absolutely worthless without drainage, I’ll just kill my plant. I’m so disappointed because it is really good looking and true to the photo. I will look for an interior liner before deciding to return
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hull

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Spruces up the area where I have my plants instead of those plain old pots. Very attractive. Sits well on plant stands. I'm glad I got it. Arrived in good shape and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly Bill

customer_reviews.title: Adequate pot/dull colors
customer_reviews.text: A perfectly adequate pot, does the job but looks better in the picture for sure. It’s less vibrant in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought to re pot "Nearly Natural, Green 4855 35in. Sansevieria with Black Planter". Was a bit of a tight fit but looks great .
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Duignan

customer_reviews.title: Strong pot, thankfully
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pot. I didn't read the fine print, so I didn't realize it had no drainage hole. My bad. Fortunately, it's very sturdy and well made, so I drilled one using a masonry bit. One strong pot!
customer_reviews.author: Hogtide

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, modern, well-made!
customer_reviews.text: The color of this pot is just beautiful. It is thick and sturdy. There is no hole at the bottom for drainage but it’s so decorative that just adding some stone in the bottom and putting a smaller pot inside works just fine! I would certainly buy this again as a goft for a indoor plant enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Reybrouck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and affordable just wish it came with its own drainage plate.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Cute but useless
customer_reviews.text: This planter is cute and perfect for the theme wanted. However it has no drainage and is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Love product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. The Swedish colors. I had to order another! My favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ri Ri

customer_reviews.title: Adds a nice touch of color to any room
customer_reviews.text: The product came exactly as pictured, with unique hand painted lines of color on the bottom of the vase. Looks great on it's own on my dining table
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but glazing issues
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews mention, the lines between the colors don’t fully overlap and are a little uneven so there’s some white peeking through. It doesn’t matter for where I placed it though. Still a good value for a medium ceramic vase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V.

customer_reviews.title: No hole at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, beware there is no hole at the bottom of the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Lun Lin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty vase
customer_reviews.text: Pretty vase that works perfectly in the space I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s quite smooth in its finishing and can be used as a planter or just a decorative vase. The color combinations makes it quite versatile for the floral arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my growing succulent. I ended up buying a second one because I loved it so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Isha J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about the color when I ordered, but it is looking good on my shelf. Seems a fine deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: nice color scheme - and style works well with modern decor.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but no drainage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty pot but the are no drainage holes. I put some loose rocks in the bottom to allow for water drainage and the plants seem fine. It's holding up to the outdoor elements well!
customer_reviews.author: led

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful detail for your home
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous I love the colors and the quality, perfect for my living room
customer_reviews.author: theo

customer_reviews.title: Vase
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful vase. Couldn’t believe it costed so less. Love it on my bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Majid Yousuf

customer_reviews.title: Great pot but no drainage holes.
customer_reviews.text: Nice large pot that can fit a 3 gallon plant + a bit extra. The quality is great but I rated it 4 stars because it doesn’t have any drainage holes which in my opinion severely limits it’s uses for outdoor plants.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent planter
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great and its quite sturdy. We are using it for an indoor silk plant, would certainly buy another of these!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Riveted
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and arrived on time. Bigger than I expected which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eo

customer_reviews.title: Nice planter.
customer_reviews.text: Well made planter pot. Good for indoor or outdoor plants. Several other planters available to mix and match.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Thick heavy pot, came in great and now houses my aloe plant! No hole in the bottom for drainage, so keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pot. Came in perfect condition and very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This is not a plastic pot! Has no drainage holes
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and pretty pot. It is solid and quite heavy with dirt and plants.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Burley

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and extremely sturdy (be warned they are heavy but I like that).
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous vase, absolutely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous vase, looks great in person with flowers in it or just on its own. Multiple people have commented on how much they like it. I don't know, when I saw it here on Amazon for the first time I was like wow, how beautiful. Vases don't normally speak to me LOL but this one did and I'll very glad I bought it. I think I got it on a lightning deal so if you see it on sale definitely get it.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie Kount

customer_reviews.title: Very Uneven or Missing Paint Near The Bottom
customer_reviews.text: I’m really torn on this vase. The colors and size are great. I really wanted something with a touch of yellow without it being in your face and this fit the bill. Now, the negative. The paint where the green meets the black was very poorly done and is an uneven area of white. It looks chipped or scratched until you get closer. I thought maybe it was just a fluke so I reordered. Sure enough, the second one was even worse. I decided to keep the vase and turn it around so the better side is facing out. Would only recommend if that type of thing doesn’t bother you.
customer_reviews.author: HBerteau

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bigger than expected, a little inconsistent on pattern , good value for the $.
customer_reviews.text: A lot larger than expected . I have no idea why I expected it to smaller when they were clear on the size but it still looks bigger than am actual 10” pot. Now that being said there is a little inconsistency with the dots and a small imperfection. I feel like it’s great value for the money I paid 35.99 for the red stripe. I would also appreciate a drain hole because all plants need a good drain. That being said I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: alen

customer_reviews.title: Nice planter pot
customer_reviews.text: The pot is pretty heavy, so it seems like it’s well made and looks very pretty. The colors that you get look different than the pictures. They are a little more green than teal and darker. But overall a nice pot.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made Pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this and my indoor Basil absolutely loves it. Plenty of room for roots to grow. A very attractive design that blends in with any decor, I recommend this and will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but too small
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of this. Unfortunately it was smaller than I needed (I thought it would be 21”) but I liked it enough to keep it for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Aimzer

customer_reviews.title: Low key style
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted; replanted my snake plant and it's doing beautifully in this pot. I like that the pot has some color and style to it and is low key so it does not distract from the rest of my decor, it adds to it.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, nice quality vase
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality vase at a good price. I like the Rivet line and will purchase more accessories now having had a chance to text the quality. The glaze/paint color on the stoneware is especially lovely!
customer_reviews.author: JenJenJen

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but paint/glaze is not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. The paint/glaze is a little off, but it’s not the end of the world. Would expect perfection at the price the asked though.
customer_reviews.author: DasKraut

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful pot. Like that it has a plug for the drain hole so I don’t have to worry about it damaging my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Elizabeth Blomberg

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Vase is beautiful and appears sturdier than I thought it would be at this price. Well packaged to protect during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful planter, color and great value for the price! I was pleasantly surprised at how heavy this planter is! The quality is great for the value! I love the colors too! Perfect pop of color for our living room!
customer_reviews.author: KillaKam_Wow

customer_reviews.title: i really like this planter.it really will work great for my plant.
customer_reviews.text: great product to use for my planting need's and will look great in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harn

customer_reviews.title: Love the mid century look
customer_reviews.text: This planter looks quite well in my mid century bedroom. It’s very sturdy and seems to be well made. One thing to keep in mind is that it does not have a drain hole, but planting with a layer of pebbles at the bottom should suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Geek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and really ties my bedroom together. I put it on my nightstand. It looks just like the picture and looks high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as pictured. No drain holes
customer_reviews.text: Green color is completely off from the pictured. And for this price, no drain holes.. (it's not self watering, just no holes). Ok otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Ksyusha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pot. Put my aloe plant in it and it looks amazing. Great quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jhille

customer_reviews.title: Great Indoor Plant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor plant pot! The color contrast nicely with walls and floors. The pot it’s strong, durable and looks great with any plant.
customer_reviews.author: rasanuma

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but with imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, stylish pot. Good size. It did turn up with a scratch and blemish though. Just turned it to the back since couldn't bother returning.
customer_reviews.author: osshopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice planter
customer_reviews.text: Really nice planter pot! Good price too. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.  Good Style.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pot. Many compliments from visitors and purchased a second one as a gift For family.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: This pot is exactly what I was looking for. It seems quite durable and looks lovely next to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vase for contemporary home
customer_reviews.text: The vase is sturdy. I haven’t tried using it with flowers or plants that require water - just dried items. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern planter.
customer_reviews.text: Substantial planter. Looks nice. White portion is more speckled than photo....
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand – Rivet Westline Modern Indoor Outdoor Hand-Painted Stoneware Flower Vase, 9.5"H, Teal White Blue Black
product_meta.description: Color:Teal| Style:VaseAn Amazon Brand - This 9.5-inch stoneware vase is great for dried or freshly cut flowers. Each vase's reactive glaze and speckle finish ensures that you'll get a unique product. The hand-painted rings at the bottom, shading from teal through green to blue, add a pop of color to your home.
feature_bullets: This 9.5-inch stoneware vase is great for dried or freshly cut flowers. Each vase's reactive glaze and speckle finish ensures that you'll get a unique product. The hand-painted rings at the bottom, shading from teal through green to blue, add a pop of color to your home.
Made from solid stoneware, this multicolored planter can be used for a many inside or outside planting options.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars260 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
